advancedAssessmentSwitchTitle:
Advanced Mode unlocks more tabs and features like uploads and confidence scores for detailed, customizable reports—recommended for third-party assessments.
For self-assessments, Quick Assessment is simpler and faster.
areYouSureYouWantDeleteAssessmentKit: Are you sure you want to delete the assessment kit "{{title}}"?
createAnAssessmentWith: Create an assessment with your desired assessment kit, answer its questions, and view the insights.
createAssessmentConfirmSettings: To create the assessment, please review and confirm the following settings.
chooseSpace: Your assessment will be created in this space and will be accessible there. You can choose a different space if you wish.
chooseTargetSpace: Choose the space where you’d like to move this assessment.
deleteExistingAssessments: Delete one or more existing assessments.
AIGeneratedNeedsApprovalDescription: This AI-generated {{label}} may be inaccurate or misleading and needs approval from an assessor.
AIIsApprovedDescription: The current {{label}} is up-to-date and approved, but can be regenerated with AI if you'd like.
AIIsExpiredDescription: This {{label}} has expired due to new answers and must be approved, edited by an assessor, or regenerated with AI.
generatedByAppNeedsApprovalDescription: This {{label}} is generated by {{title}} based on assessment results and needs to be approved or edited by an assessor.
generateDescription: The {{label}} can be written by an assessor or automatically generated by {{title}} based on the assessment results.
generateViaAIDescription: The {{label}} can be generated using AI based on answers to impactful questions.
isApprovedDescription: The current {{label}} is up-to-date and approved, but can be regenerated if you'd like.
isExpiredDescription: This {{label}} has expired due to new answers and must be approved, edited by an assessor, or regenerated based on the latest results.
questionsArentCompleteSoAICantBeGenerate: Attribute insights can't be provided until all the assessment questions have been answered.
regenerateDescription: The current {{label}} will be lost. Generate a new one?
regenerateViaAIDescription: The current {{label}} will be lost. Generate a new one with AI?
learnWhyThisIsUnavailable: Learn why this action is unavailable?
quickAssessmentModeDescription: Quick Assessment Mode shows only essential steps for faster completion and direct access to the final report — ideal for self-assessments.
quickAssessmentSwitchTitle:
Quick Assessment hides extra tabs for a faster experience. For full features, use Advanced Mode.
Switch modes?
reachedNumberOfAssessments: You’ve reached the maximum number of assessments allowed in the Basic space. To create a new assessment.
shortTitleInfo: A very short title (a few characters) for addressing the product under assessment in reports.
successCreatedAssessmentMessage: For now, you're the only one who can see this assessment. You can grant access to others via the settings page.
tryCreatingNewAssessment: There is no assessment in this space. Try creating one.
areYouSureYouWantDeleteAssessment: Your assessment will be deleted. Do you want to continue?
